name: Jump, Dodge, Die, Repeat
description:
Jump, Dodge, Die, Repeat is a short side-scrolling adventure game, presenting you the story of Isani, a snake who was born from blood, with only one purpose, to honor his master’s wish. Isani's journey begins in a basement where he finds out that his task will not be easy and that any obstacles he encounters, will be bound to kill him.

Gameplay


Isani will need your assistance to finish his task, however, this will not be easy, as once you begin your journey, almost anything out there will want to kill Isani. Anything that is thrown, jumps, runs, falls towards Isani should be avoided, as even the slightest touch will kill him. The story will progress through different levels, each with their own theme.

As the story progresses, a choice will be made, one that will impact how the story ends.
  • The story has 2 different endings.
  • You will need to be careful with every step you make and always be on guard.
  • The dialogues are enriched with references or “meme” quotes.
